NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Electrical machinery, apparatus, equipment and consumables; lighting
Parts for electrical motors and generators
Electrical apparatus for switching or protecting electrical circuits
Electrical parts of machinery or apparatus
Parts of electronic valves and tubes

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B02

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority Atlantic Technological University wishes to establish a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) under 9 lots for electrical supplies, equipment, components, and consumables for all ATU sites, covering products including but not limited to: Electrical Consumables, Electrical/Electronic Lab Power Supplies, Test Equipment, Programmable Controllers, Educational Training Kits and Equipment, Distribution Boards, Motor Control Panels, Electric Motor Controllers and Drives, Electric Motors, Electronic Consumables, Cables, Robotics Equipment. Please note this is a non-exhaustive list, and additional items falling within these categories may be required over the lifetime of the DPS.
The DPS will be in place for a minimum of 5 years with an approximate spend of €7m and will be the main procurement route for the Atlantic Technological University Electrical Supplies.
The DPS is open for applications until 1st December 2027 as a minimum.

MAIN_SITE.P: ATU Galway Mayo, ATU Sligo, ATU Donegal

SHORT_DESCR.P: ATU wishes to establish a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) under 6 lots for electrical supplies, components, and consumables for all ATU sites, covering products including but not limited to: Central Heating Panels, Motor Controls for Panels, Distribution Boards and Components, Electrical Equipment, Electrical and Electronic Consumables, Electrical Equipment and Apparatus, Robotics Equipment, Educational Training Kits and Equipment, Electrical Accessories, Electrical Contacts, Electrical Circuits, Electrical Materials, Instruments for Measuring Electrical Quantities, Cables, Batteries, Tools, Data Interfacing Equipment, PLC’s.
Please note this is a non-exhaustive list, and additional items falling within these categories may be required over the lifetime of the DPS.
The DPS will be in place for a minimum of 5 years with an approximate spend of €5m and will be the main procurement route for the Atlantic Technological University Food requirements.
The DPS is open for applications until 1st December 2027 as a minimum, however it will become operational with effect from 28th November 2022.
Lot Description:
• Lot 1 – Electrical Consumables
• Lot 2 - Electrical/Electronic Lab Power Supplies and Test Equipment
• Lot 3 – Programmable Controllers
• Lot 4 – Educational Training Kits and Equipment
• Lot 5 – Distribution Boards and Motor Control Panels
• Lot 6 – Electric Motor Controllers and Drives
• Lot 7 – Electric Motors
• Lot 8 – Electronic Consumables
• Lot 9 – Robotics Equipment

MAIN_SITE.P: ATU Galway City, ATU Donegal, ATU Sligo

SHORT_DESCR.P: ATU wishes to establish a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) under 6 lots for electrical supplies, components, and consumables for all ATU sites, covering products including but not limited to: Central Heating Panels, Motor Controls for Panels, Distribution Boards and Components, Electrical Equipment, Electrical and Electronic Consumables, Electrical Equipment and Apparatus, Robotics Equipment, Educational Training Kits and Equipment, Electrical Accessories, Electrical Contacts, Electrical Circuits, Electrical Materials, Instruments for Measuring Electrical Quantities, Cables, Batteries, Tools, Data Interfacing Equipment, PLC’s.
Please note this is a non-exhaustive list, and additional items falling within these categories may be required over the lifetime of the DPS.
The DPS will be in place for a minimum of 5 years with an approximate spend of €5m and will be the main procurement route for the Atlantic Technological University Food requirements.
The DPS is open for applications until 1st December 2027 as a minimum, however it will become operational with effect from 28th November 2022.
Lot Description:
• Lot 1 – Electrical Consumables
• Lot 2 - Electrical/Electronic Lab Power Supplies and Test Equipment
• Lot 3 – Programmable Controllers
• Lot 4 – Educational Training Kits and Equipment
• Lot 5 – Distribution Boards and Motor Control Panels
• Lot 6 – Electric Motor Controllers and Drives
• Lot 7 – Electric Motors
• Lot 8 – Electronic Consumables
• Lot 9 – Robotics Equipment
